content: I think it's a good idea. Do we have to submit anything for it? Also, for the poster, I wrote the abstract recapping what we've done and will be submitting it later today.

the abstract looks great to me too! i've commented on a couple grammar things, otherwise looks great.
I just heard we should be able to have a hybrid meeting.

Hey everyone. Just passing along more info about the satellite meetings during this year's Dataverse Community Meeting.

Working group leads interested in meeting in-person and online on May 12 can use the DCM2026 registration form to request a meeting for the working group.

On the registration form, WG leads will need to include a list of in-person attendees, who won't be let in if they haven't registered and aren't on the list, and are responsible for letting group members know about the May 12 meeting and for any marketing for new members.

@Julian Gautier thanks!

@Dieuwertje Bloemen how does this look? It's a doc to start collecting names of attendees: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1uQIZtN6yuqH2XlcfRxNKa3KGvbsxT-fHIUZzKOZGR2k/edit?usp=sharing

I went ahead and added it to our web page under a new heading called "next in-person meeting"

It looks like this:

in-person.png
BTW: Our poster got accepted :tada:
